Module imagingbook.pdf
Package imagingbook.pdf

Class PdfExporter.Parameters

java.lang.Object
imagingbook.pdf.PdfExporter.Parameters
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterBundle<PdfExporter>
Enclosing class:
PdfExporter
public static class PdfExporter.Parameters extends Object implements ParameterBundle<PdfExporter>
Parameter bundle for class PdfExporter. Annotations are used for inserting the complete parameter bundle in ImageJ's GenericDialog.

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public boolean validate()
      Description copied from interface: ParameterBundle
      Validates the correctness and compatibility of the parameters in this bundle. Does nothing by default, implementing classes should override this method.
      Specified by:
      validate in interface ParameterBundle<PdfExporter>
      Returns:
      true if all parameters are OK, false otherwise
